anya-e1001n4:8: Atipiyo na kātabbo, khalo kotuhalaṁ karo;
anya-e1001n4:11: Sappo duṭṭho khalo duṭṭho, sappā duṭṭhataro khalo;
anya-e1001n4:14: Yo bālo maññati bālyaṁ, paṇḍito vāpi tenaso;
anya-e1001n4:15: Bālo ca paṇḍitamānī, sa ve bāloti vuccati.
anya-e1001n4:17: Madhūva maññati bālo, yāva pāpaṁ na paccati;
anya-e1001n4:18: Yadā ca paccati pāpaṁ, atha dukkhaṁ nigacchati.
anya-e1001n4:20: Na sādhu balavā bālo, sāhasā vindate dhanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:23: Ghare duṭṭho mūsiko ca, vane duṭṭho ca vānaro;
anya-e1001n4:24: Sakuṇe ca duṭṭho kāko, nareduṭṭho ca brāhmaṇo.
anya-e1001n4:26: Dīghā jāgarato ratti, dīghaṁ santassa yojanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:32: Nattadosaṁ pare jaññā, jaññā dosaṁ parassatu;
anya-e1001n4:38: Yathā udumbarapakkā, bahi rattakā eva ca;
anya-e1001n4:42: Na so dhammaṁ vijānāti, dabbī sūparasaṁ yathā.
anya-e1001n4:45: Ekacariyaṁ daḷhaṁ kayirā, natthi bāle sahāyatā.
anya-e1001n4:50: Dujjanena samaṁ veraṁ, sakhyañcāpi na kāraye;
anya-e1001n4:51: Uṇho dahati caṅgāro, sīto kaṇhāyate karaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:54: Madhu tiṭṭhati jivhagge, hadaye halāhalaṁ visaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:57: Maṇinā bhūsito sappo, kimeso na bhayaṅkaro.
anya-e1001n4:62: Yathāpi pana sapakkā, bahi kaṇṭakameva ca;
anya-e1001n4:71: Upadeso hi mūḷhānaṁ, pakopāya na santiyā.
anya-e1001n4:73: Na ṭhātabbaṁ na gantabbaṁ, dujjanena samaṁ kvaci;
anya-e1001n4:74: Dujjano hi dukkhaṁ deti, na so sukhaṁ kadācipi.
anya-e1001n4:76: Abaddhā tattha bajjhanti, yattha bālā pabhāsare;
anya-e1001n4:77: Baddhāpi tattha muccanti, yattha dhīrā pabhāsare.
anya-e1001n4:89: Hitakkaro paro bandhu, bandhupi ahito paro;
anya-e1001n4:102: Rājadvāre susāne ca, yo tiṭṭhati so bandhavā.
anya-e1001n4:104: Na 2 vissase amittassa, mittañcāpi na vissase;
anya-e1001n4:107: Mātā mittaṁ pitā ceti, sabhāvā taṁ tayaṁ hitaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:110: Āpadāsu mittaṁ jaññā, yuddhe sūraṁ iṇe suciṁ;
anya-e1001n4:111: Bhariyaṁ khīṇesu vittesu, byasanesu ca bandhavaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:113: Sakiṁ duṭṭhañca yo mittaṁ, puna sandhātumicchati;
anya-e1001n4:117: Punappunaṁ vivaḍḍhanti, tasmā sesaṁ na kāraye.
anya-e1001n4:120: Tādisaṁ no paseveyya, hadaye tu halāhalaṁ.
anya-e1001n4:122: Na seve pharusaṁ sāmiṁ, na ca seveyya macchariṁ;
anya-e1001n4:123: Tato apaggaṇha sāmiṁ, neva niggahitaṁ tato.
anya-e1001n4:131: Ahitā paṭisedho ca, hitesu ca payojanaṁ;
anya-e1001n4:134: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:135: Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:137: Piyo garu bhāva nīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:138: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
anya-e1001n4:146: Piyo garu bhāvaniyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:147: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, na caṭṭhāne niyojako;
anya-e1001n4:149: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
anya-e1001n4:150: Gambhirañca kathaṁ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako;
